name: Tea vs Time
description:
Cute kitty cat cookies rain down into the world. 

Use WASD + SPACE to collect them. 

As you do, you will grow in size.

Alarm clocks are also raining down and if you touch one it's Tea Time and game over for you.

How big can you get? 

Assets used:

Assets:

Tea cup: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/day-3-cup-xyz-school-daily-challenge-b7e148b73c494a0187ad79cc93139e07
